revised_title: Stability and Screw Sense of the Alpha-Helix in Poly-Beta-Benzyl-L-Aspartate
tldr: This study investigates the stability and screw sense of the alpha-helix in poly-beta-benzyl-L-aspartate. The researchers use X-ray crystallography to analyze the structure and find that the alpha-helix has a right-handed screw sense. They also discover that the stability of the alpha-helix is influenced by the arrangement of the side chains in the polypeptide chain.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Molecular Biology
